mapper.select: SELECT cpt.CFMANUFACTUREORDER AS "manufactureOrder", cpt.CFTASKID AS "taskId", cpt.CFOPERATIONNAME AS "operationName", cpt.CFSTATUS AS "status", cpt.CFOPERATIONID AS "operationId", cpt.CFOPERATIONNO AS "operationNo", cptask.CFWORKPERSONID AS "workPersonId", tbp.FNAME_L2 AS "workPersonName", cpt.CFOLDBEGINTIME AS "startTime", cpt.CFOLDENDTIME AS "endTime", cpt.CFSEQ AS "seq" FROM CT_PRE_TASKBMO cpt LEFT JOIN CT_PRJ_TASK cptask ON cptask.FID = cpt.CFTASKID LEFT JOIN T_BD_PERSON tbp ON tbp.FID = cptask.cfworkpersonid WHERE cpt.CFManufactureOrder = #{manufactureId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cpt.CFOPERATIONID is not null ORDER BY cpt.CFSEQ

SELECT cpt.CFMANUFACTUREORDER AS "manufactureOrder", cpt.CFTASKID AS "taskId", cpt.CFOPERATIONNAME AS "operationName", cpt.CFSTATUS AS "status", cpt.CFOPERATIONID AS "operationId", cpt.CFOPERATIONNO AS "operationNo", cptask.CFWORKPERSONID AS "workPersonId", tbp.FNAME_L2 AS "workPersonName", cpt.CFOLDBEGINTIME AS "startTime", cpt.CFOLDENDTIME AS "endTime", cpt.CFSEQ AS "seq" FROM CT_PRE_TASKBMO cpt LEFT JOIN CT_PRJ_TASK cptask ON cptask.FID = cpt.CFTASKID LEFT JOIN T_BD_PERSON tbp ON tbp.FID = cptask.cfworkpersonid WHERE cpt.CFOPERATIONID is not null AND cpt.CFOPERATIONID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cpt.CFOPERATIONNO = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
